verses.verse: Then the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Now shalt thou see <WH7200> <WH8799> what I will do <WH6213> <WH8799> to Pharaoh <WH6547>: for with a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027> shall he let them go <WH7971> <WH8762>, and with a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027> shall he drive them out <WH1644> <WH8762> of his land <WH776>.
And 'Elohim <WH430> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, I am the YY <WH3068>:

And I appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> unto Avraham <WH85>, unto Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and unto Ya`akov <WH3290>, by the name of 'Elohim <WH410> Almighty <WH7706>, but by my name <WH8034> JEHOVAH <WH3068> was I not known <WH3045> <WH8738> to them.

And I have also established <WH6965> <WH8689> my covenant <WH1285> with them, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> them the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, the land <WH776> of their pilgrimage <WH4033>, wherein they were strangers <WH1481> <WH8804>.

And I have also heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the groaning <WH5009> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, whom <WH834> the Egyptians <WH4714> keep in bondage <WH5647> <WH8688>; and I have remembered <WH2142> <WH8799> my covenant <WH1285>.

Wherefore <WH3651> say <WH559> <WH8798> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, I am the YY <WH3068>, and I will bring <WH3318> <WH8689> you out from under the burdens <WH5450> of the Egyptians <WH4714>, and I will rid <WH5337> <WH8689> you out of their bondage <WH5656>, and I will redeem <WH1350> <WH8804> you with a stretched <WH5186> <WH8803> out arm <WH2220>, and with great <WH1419> judgments <WH8201>:

And I will take <WH3947> <WH8804> you to me for a people <WH5971>, and I will be to you a 'Elohim <WH430>: and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, which bringeth <WH3318> <WH8688> you out from under the burdens <WH5450> of the Egyptians <WH4714>.

And I will bring <WH935> <WH8689> you in unto the land <WH776>, concerning the which I did swear <WH5375> <WH8804> <WH3027> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> it to Avraham <WH85>, to Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and to Ya`akov <WH3290>; and I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> it you for an heritage <WH4181>: I am the YY <WH3068>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> so unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: but they hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> not unto Mosheh <WH4872> for anguish <WH7115> of spirit <WH7307>, and for cruel <WH7186> bondage <WH5656>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Go <WH935> <WH8798> in, speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, that he let the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> go out <WH7971> <WH8762> of his land <WH776>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Behold, the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> have not hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> unto me; how then shall Pharaoh <WH6547> hear <WH8085> <WH8799> me <WH589>, who am of uncircumcised <WH6189> lips <WH8193> ?

And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872> and unto Aharon <WH175>, and gave them a charge <WH6680> <WH8762> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and unto Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, to bring <WH3318> <WH8687> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

These be the heads <WH7218> of their fathers <WH1> ' houses <WH1004>: The sons <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205> the firstborn <WH1060> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; Hanoch <WH2585>, and Pallu <WH6396>, Hezron <WH2696>, and Karmi <WH3756>: these be the families <WH4940> of Re'uven <WH7205>.

And the sons <WH1121> of SHim`on <WH8095>; Jemuel <WH3223>, and Jamin <WH3226>, and Ohad <WH161>, and Jachin <WH3199>, and Zohar <WH6714>, and Shaul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of a Kanahanitish woman <WH3669>: these are the families <WH4940> of SHim`on <WH8095>.

And these are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> according to their generations <WH8435>; Gershon <WH1648>, and K'hat <WH6955>, and M'rari <WH4847>: and the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of Levi <WH3878> were an hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> and seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>.
The sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648>; Libni <WH3845>, and Shimi <WH8096>, according to their families <WH4940>.

And the sons <WH1121> of K'hat <WH6955>; Amram <WH6019>, and Izhar <WH3324>, and Hevron <WH2275>, and Uzziel <WH5816>: and the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of K'hat <WH6955> were an hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> and three <WH7969> years <WH8141>.
And the sons <WH1121> of M'rari <WH4847>; Mahali <WH4249> and Mushi <WH4187>: these are the families <WH4940> of Levi <WH3878> according to their generations <WH8435>.

And Amram <WH6019> took <WH3947> <WH8799> him Yokheved <WH3115> his father's sister <WH1733> to wife <WH802>; and she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> him Aharon <WH175> and Mosheh <WH4872>: and the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of Amram <WH6019> were an hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> and seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Izhar <WH3324>; Korach <WH7141>, and Nepheg <WH5298>, and Zichri <WH2147>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Uzziel <WH5816>; Mishael <WH4332>, and Elzaphan <WH469>, and Zithri <WH5644>.

And Aharon <WH175> took <WH3947> <WH8799> him EliSH'va <WH472>, daughter <WH1323> of Amminadab <WH5992>, sister <WH269> of Naashon <WH5177>, to wife <WH802>; and she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> him Nadav <WH5070>, and Abihu <WH30>, Eleazar <WH499>, and Ithamar <WH385>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Korach <WH7141>; Assir <WH617>, and Elkanah <WH511>, and Abiasaph <WH23>: these are the families <WH4940> of the Korhites <WH7145>.

And Eleazar <WH499> Aharon's <WH175> son <WH1121> took <WH3947> <WH8804> him one of the daughters <WH1323> of Putiel <WH6317> to wife <WH802>; and she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> him Pinchas <WH6372>: these are the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the L'vi'im <WH3881> according to their families <WH4940>.

These <WH1931> are that Aharon <WH175> and Mosheh <WH4872>, to whom <WH834> the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8804>, Bring out <WH3318> <WH8685> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> according to their armies <WH6635>.

These <WH1992> are they which spake <WH1696> <WH8764> to Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, to bring out <WH3318> <WH8687> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> from Egypt <WH4714>: these are that Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175>.
And it came to pass on the day <WH3117> when the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8763> unto Mosheh <WH4872> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>,

That the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, I am the YY <WH3068>: speak <WH1696> <WH8761> thou unto Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> all that I say <WH1696> <WH8802> unto thee.
And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, Behold, I am of uncircumcised <WH6189> lips <WH8193>, and how shall Pharaoh <WH6547> hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto me?
